text: Michael O. Woodburne (born 1937) is an American geologist currently Professor Emeritus at University of California, Riverside and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science., , Woodburne earned B.S. and Master’s degrees from the University of Michigan, and Ph.D. from UC Berkeley. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:University of Michigan alumni Category:University of California, Berkeley alumni
title: Michael Woodburne
